input.sentences: i had a great time at the cemetery .
i went there to pay my respects .
there were a lot of gravestones .
i put flags in all of them .
it was a lot of work .
output.sentences: We stood on the steps to get the best picture of the flag.
It overhangs the graves of those fallen under the confederacy.
Though the confederacy lost, it's a tragedy to lose people.
These flags remind us where our country has been.
